item.title: Muniru add a quote by Author-Poet Aberjhani
item.description: "Peace is not so much a political mandate as it is a shared state of consciousness that remains elevated and intact only to the degree that those who value it volunteer their existence as living examples of the same... Peace ends with the unraveling of individual hope and the emergence of the will to worship violence as a healer of private and social dis-ease. " -- Author-Poet Aberjhani

item.title: Muniru add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Most people are slow to champion love because they fear the transformation it brings into their lives. And make no mistake about it: love does take over and transform the schemes and operations of our egos in a very mighty way." -- Aberjhani
